short_description.value: Transcribe call recordings and securely redact payment card data
short_description.title: app short description

long_description.value:
Your recorded calls in Zendesk Talk transcribed by Intelligent Voice, with smart redaction of payment card data so your organisation can be compliant with PCI DSS.  

  1 month FREE trial with coupon code **FIRSTMONTHFREE**  

  Features:  

* All call recordings in Zendesk Support tickets will have a English basic transcript attached.  
*  Intelligent Voice detects and redacts credit card information in both the audio file and the transcript.  
* Find words and phrases inside your call recordings using Zendesk search.  
*  Transcript text available for Triggers and other Zendesk Apps 

  Premium features coming soon:  

* SmartTranscript makes it easy and fast to review your call recordings by linking the playback to the transcript and showing key topics at a glance  
* Automated model building:  Automatically improve the quality of your transcripts based on the content of your other tickets – Let the system find new names, phrases and product names to improve your transcription quality  
* “Hyperphonic matching”:  Extend your ability to create triggers on key words and phrases to include alternative words and soundalike phrases  
* Speaker ID:  Identify who is calling, just by the sound of their voice.  Ideal for tracking down serial fraudsters  
* Automated Language Switching:  Expand your transcription capabilities to include other languages such as Spanish, Portuguese, French and Japanese.

installation_instructions.value:
To use this application you must create a new API token and register it at [https://www.intelligentvoice.com/register/](https://www.intelligentvoice.com/register/)  

  You will need to enter your subdomain, API token and email address.  

  Follow this Zendesk guide to generate a new API token: [Generating a new API token](https://support.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/226022787-Generating-a-new-API-token-)
